DE NEDERLANDSE SPREKER

A journey

22 Jul 2021 — Joel Benson

I’m on top of Groningen, looking down. The view is beautiful for any building, let along a library! Forum Groningen is an incredible place to study, with its modern appearance and faculties, it provides access to the cities information in many ways.

There are eight floors in the forum, each which caters to its audience with a different feel. On floor two one can play billiards with a friend before using the FREE bathroom. On floor eight one can take a break from studying to gaze across the city and study its architecture. Floor four(?) has another FREE bathroom! I will spend a lot of time here, that is for sure!
